00014 #ifndef MAXDOUBLE
00015 #define MAXDOUBLE (numeric_limits<double>::max())
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 #define RAND_PROB(m) (m) * ( 1. + (random()/(double)RAND_MAX - .5))
00019 
00020 HMMTransform::HMMTransform(Controller* controller, 
00021                            size_t maxHistory, size_t window,
00022                            size_t numStates, 
00023                            size_t numObs, 
00024                            size_t numActions
00025                            ) : 
00026     TransformController(controller) {
00027 
00028     // History length should be at least 2, otherwise the program will
00029     // most probably crash.
00030     assert(window > 2);
00031     assert(maxHistory >= window);
00032 
00033     this->maxHistory = maxHistory;
00034     this->window = window;
00035     this->numStates = numStates;
00036     this->numObs = numObs;
00037     this->numActions = numActions;
00038 
00039     historyLength = 0;
00040     oHistory.resize(maxHistory); oHistory.clear();
00041     aHistory.resize(maxHistory); aHistory.clear();
00042     
00043     alpha.resize(numStates, maxHistory);    alpha.clear();
00044      beta.resize(numStates, maxHistory);     beta.clear();
00045     gamma.resize(numStates, maxHistory);    gamma = scalar_matrix<double> (numStates, maxHistory, 1./numStates);
00046 
00047     xi = new Matrix[numStates];
00048     for(size_t i=0; i<numStates; i++) {
00049         xi[i].resize(numStates,maxHistory-1);
00050         xi[i].clear();
00051     }
00052 
00053     A = new Matrix[numActions];
00054     for(size_t a=0; a<numActions; a++) {
00055         A[a].resize(numStates, numStates);
00056         for(size_t i=0; i<numStates; i++) {
00057             double norm=0.0;
00058             for(size_t j=0; j<numStates; j++) {
00059                 A[a](i,j) = RAND_PROB(1./numStates);
00060                 norm += A[a](i,j);
00061             }
00062             for(size_t j=0; j<numStates; j++)
00063                 A[a](i,j) /= norm;
00064         }
00065     }
00066 
00067     B = new Matrix[numActions];
00068     for(size_t a=0; a<numActions; a++) {
00069         B[a].resize(numStates, numObs);
00070         for(size_t i=0; i<numStates; i++) {
00071             double norm=0.0;
00072             for(size_t j=0; j<numObs; j++) {
00073                 B[a](i,j) = RAND_PROB(1./(numObs));
00074                 norm += B[a](i,j);
00075             }
00076             for(size_t j=0; j<numObs; j++)
00077                 B[a](i,j) /= norm;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081     pi.resize(numStates);
00082     for(size_t i=0; i<numStates; i++)
00083         pi(i) = 1./(numStates);
00084 
00085     // HMM vector size must be fixed to input dim of controller.
00086     // Note that HMM type is Observation.
00087     hmm.init(controller->getInputDim(), 1, 1, 1);
00088     hmm.getFeatures().clear();
00089 
00090     //for(int a=0; a < (int) numActions; a++) cerr<<"A["<<a<<"]=\t"<<A[a]<<endl;
00091     //for(int a=0; a < (int) numActions; a++) cerr<<"B["<<a<<"]=\t"<<B[a]<<endl;
00092 
00093     learn = true;
00094     prevAction = 0;
00095 }
00096 
00097 HMMTransform::~HMMTransform() {
00098     delete A;
00099     delete B;
00100     delete xi;
00101 }

00103 void HMMTransform::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action, bool computeGrad) {
00104     
00105     // This HMM code can't handle multi-dim obs.
00106     assert(obs.getFeatures().size1() == 1);
00107 
00108     // Translate histories
00109     project( oHistory, range(0, maxHistory-1))
00110         = project( oHistory, range(1, maxHistory));
00111     project( aHistory, range(0, maxHistory-1))
00112         = project( aHistory, range(1, maxHistory));
00113     // Add new observation and action at the end of the queues.
00114     oHistory(maxHistory-1) = (int)(obs.getFeatures())(0,0);
00115     aHistory(maxHistory-1) = prevAction;
00116 
00117     // re-estimate the HMM model parameters (when buffer full)
00118     if (historyLength < maxHistory)
00119         historyLength++;
00120     else {
00121         if ((obs.getSteps()-1)%maxHistory == 0)
00122             reEstimate();
00123         
00124         estimate();
00125 
00126         /*
00127         size_t iMax=0; double pMax = gamma(iMax, maxHistory-1);
00128         for(size_t i = 0; i < numStates; i++)
00129             if (gamma(i, maxHistory-1) > pMax) {
00130                 pMax = gamma(i, maxHistory-1);
00131                 iMax = i;
00132             }
00133         gamma.clear();
00134         gamma(iMax, maxHistory-1) = 1.;
00135         if (historyLength >= maxHistory) {
00136             if (pMax < .5) cerr<<"?"<<endl;
00137             else cerr<<iMax<<endl;
00138             }
00139         */
00140     }
00141 
00142     // get the final belief state
00143     // and recompute pi (for next iteration)
00144     hmm.getFeatures() = project(gamma,
00145                                 range(0, numStates),
00146                                 range(maxHistory-1, maxHistory)
00147                                 );
00148     //if (historyLength >= maxHistory)
00149     //cerr<<hmm.features<<endl;
00150 
00151     hmm.setAgent(obs.getAgent());
00152     hmm.setSteps(obs.getSteps());
00153 
00154     try {
00155         controller->getAction(hmm, action, computeGrad);
00156     } catch (std::exception& e) {
00157         cout<<"hmm: "<<hmm.getFeatures()<<endl;
00158         throw e;
00159     }
00160 
00161     // The HMM wants to know what action created what observation, not what
00162     // observation generates which action.
00163     prevAction = (size_t)action[0];
00164     assert(prevAction < numActions);
00165 
00166 }

00168 void HMMTransform::reEstimate(void) {
00169     
00170     double startP;
00171     double oldP = -MAXDOUBLE;
00172     double P=0;
00173     //int l = 0;
00174     Vector scale(maxHistory); // initialized by forwardEst()
00175     
00176     //cerr<<endl<<endl;
00177     startP = P = forwardEst(scale, maxHistory); //cerr<<"alpha=\t"<<alpha<<endl;
00178     
00179     do {
00180         //cerr<<endl;
00181         //cerr<<"HMM loop "<<l++<<": log P="<<P<<endl;
00182         oldP = P;
00183         backwardEst(scale, maxHistory); //cerr<<"beta=\t"<<beta<<endl;
00184         gammaEst(maxHistory); //cerr<<"gamma=\t"<<gamma<<endl;
00185         xiEst();
00186         //for(size_t i=0; i<numStates; i++) cerr<<"xi["<<i<<"]=\t"<<xi[i]<<endl;
00187         maximiseTrans();
00188         //for(int a=0; a < (int) numActions; a++) cerr<<"A["<<a<<"]=\t"<<A[a]<<endl;
00189         maximiseDiscreteObs();
00190         //for(int a=0; a < (int) numActions; a++) cerr<<"B["<<a<<"]=\t"<<B[a]<<endl;
00191         P = forwardEst(scale,maxHistory); //cerr<<"alpha=\t"<<alpha<<endl;
00192     }
00193     while (fabs(P - oldP)/fabs(P) > TERM_PROB_THRESH);
00194     // Stops if change is less than .1 %
00195     
00196     //cerr<<"Restimation took prob from "<<startP<<" --> "<<P<<endl;
00197 }
00198 
00199 void HMMTransform::estimate(void) {
00200 
00201     Vector scale(maxHistory); // initialized by forwardEst()
00202 
00203     forwardEst(scale, window); 
00204     backwardEst(scale, window);
00205     gammaEst(window);
00206 }
00207 
00212 double HMMTransform::forwardEst(Vector &scale, size_t L) {
00213 
00214     double logP;
00215 
00216     size_t i, j;        /* state indices */
00217     size_t t;   /* time index */
00218     size_t T = maxHistory; /* max time */
00219     
00220     double sum; /* partial sum */
00221 
00222     /* 1. Initialization */
00223     scale(T-L) = 0.0;
00224     for (i = 0; i < numStates; i++) {
00225         //alpha(i, 0) = 1.0;             // Assume equally likely to start
00226         if (T==L)
00227             alpha(i, 0) = pi(i) * B[aHistory(0)](i,oHistory(0));
00228         else
00229             alpha(i, T-L) = gamma(i, T-L) * B[aHistory(T-L)](i,oHistory(T-L));
00230         scale(T-L) += alpha(i, T-L);
00231     }
00232     for (i = 0; i <  numStates; i++) {
00233         alpha(i, T-L) /= scale(T-L); 
00234     }
00235     
00236     /* 2. Induction */
00237     for (t = T-L; t < T - 1; t++) {
00238         scale(t + 1) = 0.0;
00239         for (j=0; j < numStates; j++) {
00240             sum = 0.0;
00241             for (i = 0; i < numStates; i++) 
00242                 sum += alpha(i, t)*A[aHistory(t+1)](i,j);
00243             
00244             alpha(j, t + 1) = sum*B[aHistory(t+1)](j,oHistory(t+1));
00245             
00246             scale(t + 1) += alpha(j, t + 1);
00247         }
00248         for (j = 0; j < numStates; j++)
00249             alpha(j, t + 1) /= scale(t + 1);
00250     }
00251     
00252     /* 3. Termination */
00253     logP = 0;
00254     for (t = T-L; t <  T; t++)
00255         logP += log(scale(t));
00256     
00257     return logP;
00258 }

00260 
00261 void HMMTransform::backwardEst(Vector &scale, size_t L) {
00262     
00263     size_t i, j;   /* state indices */
00264     int t;      /* time index */
00265     double sum;
00266     size_t T = maxHistory; /* max time */
00267 
00268     /* 1. Initialization */ 
00269     for (i = 0; i < numStates; i++)
00270         beta(i, T - 1) = 1.0;
00271     
00272     /* 2. Induction */
00273     for (t = T - 2; t >= (int)(T-L); t--) {
00274         for (i = 0; i <  numStates; i++) {
00275             sum = 0.0;
00276             for (j = 0; j <  numStates; j++) 
00277                 sum += A[aHistory(t+1)](i,j)*
00278                     B[aHistory(t+1)](j,oHistory(t+1))*beta(j,t + 1);
00279             
00280             beta(i, t) = sum/scale(t);
00281         }
00282     }
00283 }

00289 void HMMTransform::gammaEst(size_t L) {
00290     
00291     size_t i;
00292     size_t t;
00293     double denominator;
00294     size_t T = maxHistory;
00295     
00296     for (t = T-L; t <  T; t++) {
00297         denominator = 0.0;
00298         for (i = 0; i <  numStates ; i++) {
00299             gamma(i, t) = alpha(i, t)*beta(i, t);
00300             denominator += gamma(i, t);
00301         }
00302         
00303         for (i = 0; i < numStates; i++) 
00304             gamma(i, t) = gamma(i, t)/denominator;
00305     }
00306     
00307 }

00315 void HMMTransform::xiEst(void) {
00316 
00317     size_t i, j;
00318     size_t t;
00319     double sum;
00320     size_t T = maxHistory;
00321     
00322     for (t = 0; t < T - 1; t++) {
00323         sum = 0.0;
00324         for (i = 0; i < numStates   ; i++) {
00325             for (j = 0; j < numStates  ; j++) {
00326                 xi[i](j, t) = alpha(i, t)*beta(j, t + 1)*
00327                     A[aHistory(t+1)](i,j)*B[aHistory(t+1)](j, oHistory(t+1));
00328 
00329                 sum += xi[i](j, t);
00330             }
00331         }
00332         
00333         // Normalise
00334         for (i = 0; i < numStates  ; i++) {
00335             for (j = 0; j < numStates  ; j++) xi[i](j, t) /= sum;
00336         }
00337     }
00338 }

00347 void HMMTransform::maximiseTrans(void) {
00348 
00349     double denominatorA;
00350     double numeratorA;
00351     double newVal;
00352     size_t i, j;
00353     size_t T = maxHistory;
00354     size_t t;
00355 
00356     for(int a = 0; a < (int)numActions; a++)
00357         // Loop through all transition parameters and update them.
00358         for (i = 0; i <  numStates; i++) {
00359             double sum = 0.;
00360             for (j = 0; j <  numStates; j++) {
00361                 denominatorA = 0.0;
00362                 numeratorA = 0.0;
00363                 for (t = 0; t <  T - 1; t++) 
00364                     if (aHistory(t+1) == a) {
00365                         numeratorA += xi[i](j, t);
00366                         denominatorA += gamma(i, t);
00367                     }
00368                 
00369                 newVal = MIN_PROB + (1 - MIN_PROB)*numeratorA/denominatorA;
00370                 
00371                 // Look out for situation where denominatorA is 0
00372                 A[a](i,j) = std::isnan(newVal) ? A[a](i,j) : newVal;
00373                 sum += A[a](i,j);
00374             }
00375             for (j = 0; j <  numStates; j++)
00376                 A[a](i,j) /= sum;
00377         }
00378     
00379 }
00380 
00384 void HMMTransform::maximiseDiscreteObs(void) {
00385 
00386     double denominator;
00387     Vector numerator(1);
00388     numerator.resize(this->numObs); // Prevents gcc 4.x warnings
00389     numerator.clear();
00390 
00391     size_t j;
00392     size_t T = maxHistory;
00393     size_t t;
00394     size_t y;
00395 
00396     for (int a = 0; a < (int)numActions; a++) {
00397         for (j = 0; j < numStates; j++) {
00398             numerator.clear();
00399             denominator = 0.0;
00400             for (t = 0; t < T; t++)
00401                 if (aHistory(t) == a) {
00402                     denominator += gamma(j, t);
00403                     numerator[oHistory(t)] += gamma(j, t);
00404                 }
00405             
00406             if (denominator != 0) {
00407                 // Update each symbol prob
00408                 double sum = 0.0;
00409                 for (y=0; y < numObs; y++) {
00410                     B[a](j, y) = MIN_PROB + 
00411                         (1.0 - MIN_PROB)*numerator[y]/denominator;
00412                     sum += B[a](j,y);
00413                 }
00414                 
00415                 for (y=0; y < numObs; y++)
00416                     B[a](j,y) /= sum;
00417             }
00418             else
00419                 for (y=0; y < numObs; y++)
00420                     B[a](j,y) = 1./numObs;
00421         }
00422     }
00423 }
